article_title: IRS Says Tax-Filing Season Will Start On Time in 2015
article_text:
WASHINGT0N—The Internal Revenue Service will start processing paper and electronically filed tax returns on time on Jan. 20, despite late action by Congress this month on numerous temporary tax measures.

The start of the filing season often has been delayed because of late congressional action on tax laws. A brief government shutdown in late 2013 also delayed the 2014 filing season.

But this time around, the IRS said it would...

twitter.description: The 2015 tax-filing season will start on time on Jan. 20, the Internal Revenue Service said Monday, despite late action by Congress this month on numerous temporary tax measures.
twitter.creator: @johndmckinnon

image.alt: IRS says tax-filing season will start on time on Jan. 20, 2015
